title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\SparkSqlBatch
name: SparkSqlBatch
description:
A configuration for running Apache Spark SQL queries as a batch workload.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.SparkSqlBatch

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.query_file_uri
params.description: Required. The HCFS URI of the script that contains Spark SQL queries to execute.

params.name: data.query_variables
params.description: Optional. Mapping of query variable names to values (equivalent to the Spark SQL command: SET name="value";).

params.name: data.jar_file_uris
params.description: Optional. HCFS URIs of jar files to be added to the Spark CLASSPATH.
